sqls.sql: SELECT wkp_status, wkp_no, wkp_name, wkp_type1, wkp_type2, factory_no, wkc_rule, batch_rule, batch_qty_min, batch_qty_add, batch_qty_max, wkt_produce_unit, wkp_mtr_use_type, is_auto_fb, wkt_type, wkt_before_c, wkt_after_c, wkt_produce_c, qty_produce_c, wkt_worker_c, wkc_worker_num_c, wkt_before_b, wkt_after_b, wkt_produce_b, qty_produce_b, wkt_worker_b, wkc_worker_num_b, wkt_before_a, wkt_after_a, wkt_produce_a, qty_produce_a, wkt_worker_a, wkc_worker_num_a, pd_wkp_rmk01, pd_wkp_rmk02, pd_wkp_rmk03, pd_wkp_rmk04, pd_wkp_rmk05, pd_wkp_rmk06, pd_wkp_rmk07, pd_wkp_rmk08, pd_wkp_rmk09, pd_wkp_rmk010, crt_time, crt_user, crt_user_no, crt_user_name, crt_host, upd_time, upd_user, upd_user_no, upd_user_name, upd_host, need_fpi, need_fbi FROM pd_wkp WHERE wkp_no = @wkp_no OR wkp_id = @wkp_id;
DELETE FROM pd_wkp WHERE wkp_no = @wkp_no OR wkp_id = @wkp_id;
